Description: (Description fron Christy register) Pottery cup, red with two holes in sides opposite each other.
Curator's comments: The register records that this was "used with sticks to put bread and cakes in the oven; Gizeh, Egypt". A marginal annotation 10/11/83 suggests that Petrie had acquired it in 1883.
Acquisition name: From: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Acquisition notes: Given by W M F Petrie
